idea-plugin.name: ARO Language
idea-plugin.description:
Language support for ARO (Action Result Object) - a declarative programming language for expressing business features.

Features

  • Syntax Highlighting - Full highlighting for ARO code
  • Code Completion - Live templates for common patterns
  • Bracket Matching - Match braces, parentheses, and angle brackets
  • Comment Support - Block comments with (* *)
  • File Icon - Distinct icon for .aro files

ARO Syntax

(Application-Start: My Service) {
    <Log> the <message> for the <console> with "Starting...".
    <Return> an <OK: status> for the <startup>.
}

See ARO Documentation for more information.
